value:
Ah, cruel boredom, why must you
hound me so? Perhaps I shall go
and admire a mirror for a while...

I am the rightful ruler of Rosanne,
a duchy in faraway Valm. I was...
forced from my homeland.

I have noted your good works in
patrolling and leading us. You've
done well to draw my eye!

Might I interest you in a game of
chess? I promise to avoid dirty
tricks till the latter half of the game.

I've brewed some tea using some of
the fascinating herbs you grow in
this land... Hmm? Weeds, you say?

I come bearing gracious greetings
for $Nu.$k$pAh, from whom? Well, none other
than $Nf!
Please! Avert your envious gazes!

I could do no less—not with my
reputation!
What? So little gain for my efforts?

I see you have granted me
power to match my splendor!

I am Virion, the finest archer
of the fairest of realms.
Delighted to be of service.

Ah, may I steal a bit of your time,
$Nu?$k$pI've grown fascinated with the
board games of other cultures
lately. Care to play one now?$k$pTake a look—this board is the
battlefield and this dazzling little
gemstone is yours truly.$k$pAll of these pieces—you move
them around the board as you
would fighters in a battle.$k$pYes, yes... Of course... Very good.
You grasp the game quickly, as
I suspected you would.$k$pBut I see that you're not willing
to sacrifice that dazzling little
gemstone...$k$pWho can blame you? It is more
scintillating than all the rest!
Still, I need to tell you...$k$pYou're playing that wrong. It's
better strategy to sacrifice any
piece for the greater good.$k$pMuch as you could choose to
rid yourself of me from your
team to serve your purposes.$k$pThere are other Heroes to bring
into the fold. But do I sense...that
you're repelled by the idea?$k$pYou don't want to sacrifice anyone,
do you? Very well. Then as the
first Hero you summoned...$k$pI will make it my duty to keep
polishing myself into the most
dazzling stone in your possession!
はっ！
そぉれ！
おわっ！？
Irksome...
Die with magnificence!
One for the bards!
Such perfection!
I have a gift for you.
Whew...
Greetings! You appear to be in high spirits today.
I fancy a cup of tea right now. Care to join me?
I see that, like so many, you have been spellbound by my elegance.
Isn't my ruff extraordinary? ...What?! You thought it was a bib?!
I know my radiance makes it difficult, but do try not to stare.
*sigh* I miss the noble pastimes of my homeland.
You may count on my help until the war is won.
Very well.
Indeed.
Quite so.
